name: Exploring Geekland
description:
Urban exploration isn't easy. Many hazards make it difficult or even dangerous to record abandoned places: Crumbling buildings, unstable surfaces, living characters trying to escape... It can be stressful and exhausting!

In this prologue chapter of Exploring GeekLand, see what lore you can find while you scout your way into a long-abandoned island theme park.

What you do in the prologue will carry over into the rest of the adventure.

Discuss the game on Discord: https://discord.gg/t3fKSqp

The music in Exploring GeekLand is DMCA-free. Let's-plays and livestreams of Exploring GeekLand will NOT be targeted for strikes or takedowns.
